name: 黃正民

Week 12. Optimal Control Systems

Week 14. Applications of Digital Control Systems

Week 16. Applications of Digital Control Systems

Week 18. Presentation of Final Project

Homework (with Matlab programming)                           20%

Final Project (paper survey with simulations or experiments) 45%
